sentences.sContent: If you have a headache, you should take some aspirin.
sentences.sCn: 要是头痛，你该吃点阿司匹林。

sentences.sContent: The airline's biggest headache is the increase in the price of aviation fuel.
sentences.sCn: 令航空公司最头疼的问题是航空燃料价格的上涨。

sentences.sContent: ...A headache is important because it can be the first warning of a serious condition that could probably be controlled if discovered early...
...Almost everyone suffers from a headache occasionally...
...A headache often interferes needlessly with normal...
...Because hunger may be overlooked as a headache source...
...The mother with a headache suffers and disturbs the family...
...Why does the speaker say a headache is important...
...The employee with a headache does less work...

synos.tran: [内科]头痛；麻烦；令人头痛之事

phrases.pCn: 丛集性头痛；组合性头痛；头痛群

words.tran: 猎头者；物色人才的人；猎取人头的蛮人
